# Copilot Instructions for G365Calendar

## Project Overview
This is a calendar application designed to expose Microsoft 365 (M365) calendar data directly on Garmin wearable devices. The project bridges M365 calendar services with Garmin's wearable platform.

## Code Style and Conventions
- Follow consistent naming conventions throughout the codebase
- Write clear, descriptive commit messages
- Keep code modular and maintainable

## Development Guidelines
- When making changes, ensure compatibility with both M365 API and Garmin Connect IQ SDK
- Test changes thoroughly before committing
- Document any API integrations or external dependencies
- Consider battery efficiency and performance implications for wearable devices

## Testing
- Validate calendar data synchronization
- Test on various Garmin device models when possible
- Verify M365 authentication and authorization flows

## Documentation
- Update README.md when adding new features or changing functionality
- Document any configuration requirements or environment variables
- Include setup instructions for new developers
